1 byte of space on Bitcoin's blockchain presently costs ~112 satoshis, or $0.0097. An 8TB hard drive costs $160. The equivalent amount of space on Bitcoin's blockchain would cost ~$77 billion, or 500 million times more expensive than storage on a single hard drive.
